name: Birds and Shells
description:
Welcome to the beach! It is new casual clicker game. Are you hands fastest? Prove it!

Catch shells dropped by birds.It's not easy. Speed-your main enemy. Get as many points as you can! Beat your own records and other players in leaderboard. At you disposal consumables and passive-skills that help you take first place! Also get daily rewards to increase your advantages. Shells or candies?With many different themes and landscapes you never be bored. Include your mindfulness, and get ready for an exciting game in "Birds and Shells"!

Features:

  • Free to play anywhere anytime.
  • Suitable for all ages.
  • Simple upgrade system.
  • Enjoy landscapes.
  • Competition with other players.

Download on Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ezbeard.birdsandshells
